lexUnit.name: crouch.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: adopt a position where the knees are bent and the upper body is brought forward and down.

sentence.text: Then crouching low , she squeezed herself through the hens ' low archway , and into the dark warm gloom of their hut .
He crouched low and peered into the debris under the grate .
He crouched forward on his chair .
Why , when the opposition goalie was taking a goal-kick , did he crouch forward and remain motionless like Johnny Fartpants ? was this some attempt to psyche out the opposition ?
Then he crouched against the ice , and stayed there .
Kirov crouched at his side , removing a couple of pins and replacing them in exactly the same position .
One of the turbanned boys ran on and crouched at the side of the platform , carrying a placard helpfully inscribed : Antigone .
He crouched before the bookcase and ran his eyes along the tightly packed , fading broken spines of familiar paperbacks , reading names and titles .
The dreamer came and crouched before her .
He crouched behind the mother to squirt milk into the bottle .
Benedicta rose and crouched beside her , stroking her hands gently .
He hurried over to where Ngune lay and crouched anxiously beside him , horrified at the sight of Ngune 's discoloured , swollen face .
George stopped and Libby crouched beside him , waiting until her eyes saw the figure by the tree .
He crouched by Doyle .
She crouched in the middle of the carpet , hands clasped around her knees , each breath having to fight for its existence against the competition of a thundering heartbeat .
Change hands , push to where you were sitting , crouch in the middle of the boat and straighten up on the new course .
Hairy and naked , Sam had crouched on the bed feeling exposed and helpless .
Others crouched on their haunches and kicked out their back legs behind them , like men carrying out a complex fitness programme .
Instead , she crouched over the radio , listening , like all the others , as the news bulletin began .
When he did n't answer I crouched in front of him .
She climbed out into the garden and crouched close to the wall , waiting for the others to follow .
He moved closer , crouching over the boy .
Then he crouched over it and squared up to an imaginary ball .
They set out their bedrolls and crouched round the flames , except for the unfortunate Rimir who had first watch .
There were tears in his eyes when he crouched to gather up the debris , scooping it into a pile with both hands while Sweetheart roared with laughter .
The nomes crouched where they could , listening fearfully to the sounds above them .
